title: HeyToo 9inch Glitter Women Handheld Fan With Shining Transparent Fan Rib for Wedding,Church,Festival,Dance,Party Prom,Club,EDM Accessory Black

Made with glitter fabric and a transparent fan rib, this fan is not only elegant but also eye-catching. Its unique design sets it apart, making it ideal for weddings, festivals, parties, and more.

This lightweight and sturdy fan is easy to open and operates quietly, so you can stay cool without any distractions. The colorful shining glitter fabric adds a touch of sparkle to your outfit, making you stand out in the crowd.
